The purpose of the experiments is to define a hierarchy of all the parameters considered, by varying systematically each of them, comparing semi-quantitatively the variations on dike geometry and velocity.;-17.77313232421875;-16.556396484375;64.55906111505632;64.9072397186371;Along strike topography along-strike topography of the 2014 Bardarbunga intrusion
